Title: The Company of Wolves
Writer: Angela Carter (screenplay), Neil Jordan (screenplay), Angela Carter (story "The Company of Wolves"), Charles Perrault (Quotations from "Petit Chaperon Rouge")
Actors: Angela Lansbury, David Warner, Graham Crowden, Brian Glover
Plot: A teenage girl in a country manor falls asleep while reading a magazine, and has a disturbing dream involving wolves prowling the woods below her bedroom window.
Awards: Nominated for 4 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 10 wins & 1 nomination.
